abstract: Jay Romano Real Estate Q&A on New York City laws and regulations governing the authority of co-op boards to regulate tenant behavior, appliance replacement in rent-stabilized apartments and transfer of lease in a multifamily building that has change of ownership.
snippet: Behavior issues in a co-op; replacing the fridge in a stabilized unit; how to prepare for a new landlord.
lead_paragraph: Behavior issues in a co-op; replacing the fridge in a stabilized unit; how to prepare for a new landlord.

headline.seo: New York Real Estate Question & Answer
